Name: a land Goo's crazy
About the game: A land Goo's crazy is type of roguelike indie game. You arrive to a land full of Goos, not knowing what is going on. You have a mark on your back corresponding to that of this kingdom. Maybe the king have more answers. But it is too dangerous. The first Goo helps you out whit a cape to cover your mark. Suddenly you transform to a special form with strong power. The power of memory. You take this gift and travel. By time the memory rise and things comes more clear. You are on a mission! Help the corrupted land to gain peace again! This game is done by two person My Brother and Me Powered with : Pixel Game Maker MV Music created: by my Brother in Garage Band Art: by Me in Art rage 2 with a pen table Voices: recorded by Me on Smartphone Here some first steps to start. R1 Menue and R2 until page 9, there is the note spot where you can save the game 'as long as you are a Goo'. There is no else a save spot in game. After a win on the run or a fail in between, you loose all your gains except your memorys. Save after every run as mentioned. Don't be frustrated to much as there will be runs with a hard time. But you gain always some memory out of it to upgrade the protagonist. Information All informations are in the book of Goos. There are manny hints to have a better life. In game currency The last shirt has no pockets so spend the coins wisely.
